segment_text: Red and Slim found the two strange little animals the morning after they heard the thunder sounds.
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: They knew that they could never show their new pets to their parents.
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: There was a spatter of pebbles against the window and the youngster stirred in his sleep.
scene_description: indoors, rustic window frame, green foliage outside, dim morning light

segment_text: Another, and he was awake.
scene_description: indoors, rustic window frame, green foliage outside, dim morning light

segment_text: He sat up stiffly in bed.
scene_description: indoors, rustic window frame, green foliage outside, dim morning light

segment_text: Seconds passed while he interpreted his strange surroundings.
scene_description: indoors, rustic window frame, green foliage outside, dim morning light

segment_text: He wasn't in his own home, of course. This was out in the country.
scene_description: indoors, rustic window frame, green foliage outside, dim morning light

segment_text: It was colder than it should be and there was green at the window.
scene_description: indoors, rustic window frame, green foliage outside, dim morning light

segment_text: "Slim!"
scene_description: indoors, rustic window frame, green foliage outside, dim morning light

segment_text: The call was a hoarse, urgent whisper, and the youngster bounded to the open window.
scene_description: indoors, rustic window frame, green foliage outside, dim morning light

segment_text: Slim wasn't his real name, but the new friend he had met the day before had needed only one look at his slight figure to say, "You're Slim."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: He added, "I'm Red."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: Red wasn't his real name, either, but its appropriateness was obvious.
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: They were friends instantly with the quick unquestioning friendship of young ones not yet quite in adolescence, before even the first stains of adulthood began to make their appearance.
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: Slim cried, "Hi, Red!" and waved cheerfully, still blinking the sleep out of himself.
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: Red kept to his croaking whisper, "Quiet! You want to wake somebody?"
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: Slim noticed all at once that the sun scarcely topped the low hills in the east, that the shadows were long and soft, and that the grass was wet.
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: Slim said, more softly, "What's the matter?"
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: Red only waved for him to come out.
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: Slim dressed quickly, gladly confining his morning wash to the momentary sprinkle of a little lukewarm water.
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: He let the air dry the exposed portions of his body as he ran out, while bare skin grew wet against the dewy grass.
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: Red said, "You've got to be quiet. If Mom wakes up or Dad or your Dad or even any of the hands then it'll be 'Come on in or you'll catch your death of cold.'"
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: He mimicked voice and tone faithfully, so that Slim laughed and thought that there had never been so funny a fellow as Red.
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: Slim said, eagerly, "Do you come out here every day like this, Red? Real early?"
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "It's like the whole world is just yours, isn't it, Red? No one else around and all like that." He felt proud at being allowed entrance into this private world.
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: Red stared at him sidelong.
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: He said carelessly, "I've been up for hours. Didn't you hear it last night?"
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "Hear what?"
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "Thunder."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "Was there a thunderstorm?" Slim never slept through a thunderstorm.
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "I guess not. But there was thunder. I heard it, and then I went to the window and it wasn't raining.
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: It was all stars and the sky was just getting sort of almost gray. You know what I mean?"
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: Slim had never seen it so, but he nodded.
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "So I just thought I'd go out," said Red.
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: They walked along the grassy side of the concrete road that split the panorama right down the middle all the way down to where it vanished among the hills.
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: It was so old that Red's father couldn't tell Red when it had been built. It didn't have a crack or a rough spot in it.
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: Red said, "Can you keep a secret?"
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "Sure, Red. What kind of a secret?"
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "Just a secret. Maybe I'll tell you and maybe I won't. I don't know yet."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: Red broke a long, supple stem from a fern they passed, methodically stripped it of its leaflets and swung what was left whip-fashion.
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: For a moment, he was on a wild charger, which reared and champed under his iron control.
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: Then he got tired, tossed the whip aside and stowed the charger away in a corner of his imagination for future use.
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: He said, "There'll be a circus around."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: Slim said, "That's no secret. I knew that. My Dad told me even before we came here--"
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "That's not the secret. Fine secret! Ever see a circus?"
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "Oh, sure. You bet."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "Like it?"
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "Say, there isn't anything I like better."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: Red was watching out of the corner of his eyes again.
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "Ever think you would like to be with a circus? I mean, for good?"
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: Slim considered, "I guess not. I think I'll be an astronomer like my Dad. I think he wants me to be."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "Huh! Astronomer!" said Red.
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: Slim felt the doors of the new, private world closing on him and astronomy became a thing of dead stars and black, empty space.
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: He said, placatingly, "A circus _would_ be more fun."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "You're just saying that."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "No, I'm not. I mean it."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: Red grew argumentative. "Suppose you had a chance to join the circus right now. What would you do?"
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass
outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "See!" Red affected scornful laughter.
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: Slim was stung. "I'd join up."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "Go on."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "Try me."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: Red whirled at him, strange and intense. "You meant that? You want to go in with me?"
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "What do you mean?" Slim stepped back a bit, surprised by the unexpected challenge.
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "I got something that can get us into the circus. Maybe someday we can even have a circus of our own.
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: We could be the biggest circus-fellows in the world. That's if you want to go in with me. Otherwise--Well, I guess I can do it on my own. I just thought: Let's give good old Slim a chance."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: The world was strange and glamorous, and Slim said, "Sure thing, Red. I'm in! What is it, huh, Red? Tell me what it is."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "Figure it out. What's the most important thing in circuses?"
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: Slim thought desperately. He wanted to give the right answer.
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: Finally, he said, "Acrobats?"
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "Holy Smokes! I wouldn't go five steps to look at acrobats."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "I don't know then."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "Animals, that's what! What's the best side-show? Where are the biggest crowds?
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: Even in the main rings the best acts are animal acts." There was no doubt in Red's voice.
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "Do you think so?"
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "Everyone thinks so. You ask anyone. Anyway, I found animals this morning. Two of them."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "And you've got them?"
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "Sure. That's the secret. Are you telling?"
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "Of course not."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "Okay. I've got them in the barn. Do you want to see them?"
scene_description: outdoors, weathered wooden barn wall, large dark doorway, overgrown grass path

segment_text: They were almost at the barn; its huge open door black. Too black.
scene_description: outdoors, weathered wooden barn wall, large dark doorway, overgrown grass path

segment_text: They had been heading there all the time. Slim stopped in his tracks.
scene_description: outdoors, weathered wooden barn wall, large dark doorway, overgrown grass path

segment_text: He tried to make his words casual. "Are they big?"
scene_description: outdoors, weathered wooden barn wall, large dark doorway, overgrown grass path

segment_text: "Would I fool with them if they were big? They can't hurt you. They're only about so long.
scene_description: outdoors, weathered wooden barn wall, large dark doorway, overgrown grass path

segment_text: I've got them in a cage."
scene_description: outdoors, weathered wooden barn wall, large dark doorway, overgrown grass path

segment_text: They were in the barn now and Slim saw the large cage suspended from a hook in the roof.
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: It was covered with stiff canvas.
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: Red said, "We used to have some bird there or something. Anyway, they can't get away from there. Come on, let's go up to the loft."
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: They clambered up the wooden stairs and Red hooked the cage toward them.
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: Slim pointed and said, "There's sort of a hole in the canvas."
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: Red frowned. "How'd that get there?" He lifted the canvas, looked in, and said, with relief, "They're still there."
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: "The canvas appeared to be burned," worried Slim.
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: "You want to look, or don't you?"
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: Slim nodded slowly. He wasn't sure he wanted to, after all.
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: They might be--
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: But the canvas had been jerked off and there they were. Two of them, the way Red said.
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: They were small, and sort of disgusting-looking.
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: The animals moved quickly as the canvas lifted and were on the side toward the youngsters.
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: Red poked a cautious finger at them.
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: "Watch out," said Slim, in agony.
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: "They don't hurt you," said Red. "Ever see anything like them?"
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: "No."
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: "Can't you see how a circus would jump at a chance to have these?"
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: "Maybe they're too small for a circus."
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: Red looked annoyed. He let go the cage which swung back and forth pendulum-fashion.
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: "You're just trying to back out, aren't you?"
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: "No, I'm not. It's just--"
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: "They're not too small, don't worry. Right now, I've only got one worry."
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: "What's that?"
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: "Well, I've got to keep them till the circus comes, don't I? I've got to figure out what to feed them meanwhile."
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: The cage swung and the little trapped creatures clung to its bars, gesturing at the youngsters with queer, quick motions--almost as though they were intelligent.
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: The Astronomer entered the dining room with decorum. He felt very much the guest.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: He said, "Where are the youngsters? My son isn't in his room."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: The Industrialist smiled. "They've been out for hours. However, breakfast was forced into them among the women some time ago, so there is nothing to worry about. Youth, Doctor, youth!"
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: "Youth!" The word seemed to depress the Astronomer.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: They ate breakfast in silence.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: The Industrialist said once, "You really think they'll come. The day looks so--_normal_."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: The Astronomer said, "They'll come."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: That was all.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: Afterward the Industrialist said, "You'll pardon me. I can't conceive your playing so elaborate a hoax. You really spoke to them?"
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: "As I speak to you. At least, in a sense. They can project thoughts."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: "I gathered that must be so from your letter. How, I wonder."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: "I could not say. I asked them and, of course, they were vague. Or perhaps it was just that I could not understand.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: It involves a projector for the focussing of thought and, even more than that, conscious attention on the part of both projector and receptor. It was quite a while before I realized they were trying to think at me. Such thought-projectors may be part of the science they will give us."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: "Perhaps," said the Industrialist. "Yet think of the changes it would bring to society. A thought-projector!"
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: "Why not? Change would be good for us."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: "I don't think so."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: "It is only in old age that change is unwelcome," said the Astronomer, "and races can be old as well as individuals."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: The Industrialist pointed out the window. "You see that road. It was built Beforethewars. I don't know exactly when.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: It is as good now as the day it was built. We couldn't possibly duplicate it now. The race was young when that was built, eh?"
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: "Then? Yes! At least they weren't afraid of new things."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: "No. I wish they had been. Where is the society of Beforethewars? Destroyed, Doctor! What good were youth and new things? We are better off now.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: The world is peaceful and jogs along. The race goes nowhere but after all, there is nowhere to go. _They_ proved that. The men who built the road. I will speak with your visitors as I agreed, if they come. But I think I will only ask them to go."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: "The race is not going nowhere," said the Astronomer, earnestly. "It is going toward final destruction.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: My university has a smaller student body each year. Fewer books are written. Less work is done. An old man sleeps in the sun and his days are peaceful and unchanging, but each day finds him nearer death all the same."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: "Well, well," said the Industrialist.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: "No, don't dismiss it. Listen. Before I wrote you, I investigated your position in the planetary economy."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: "And you found me solvent?" interrupted the Industrialist, smiling.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: "Why, yes. Oh, I see, you are joking. And yet--perhaps the joke is not far off.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: You are less solvent than your father and he was less solvent than his father. Perhaps your son will no longer be solvent."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: "It becomes too troublesome for the planet to support even the industries that still exist, though they are toothpicks to the oak trees of Beforethewars. We will be back to village economy and then to what? The caves?"
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: "And the infusion of fresh technological knowledge will be the changing of all that?"
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: "Not just the new knowledge. Rather the whole effect of change, of a broadening of horizons. Look, sir, I chose you to approach in this matter not only because you were rich and influential with government officials, but because you had an unusual reputation, for these days, of daring to break with tradition.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: Our people will resist change and you would know how to handle them, how to see to it that--that--"
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: "That the youth of the race is revived?"
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: "Yes."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: "With its atomic bombs?"
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: "The atomic bombs," returned the Astronomer, "need not be the end of civilization. These visitors of mine had their atomic bomb, or whatever their equivalent was on their own worlds, and survived it, because they didn't give up.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: Don't you see? It wasn't the bomb that defeated us, but our own shell shock. This may be the last chance to reverse the process."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: "Tell me," said the Industrialist, "what do these friends from space want in return?"
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: The Astronomer hesitated. He said, "I will be truthful with you. They come from a denser planet. Ours is richer in the lighter atoms."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: "They want magnesium? Aluminum?"
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: "No, sir. Carbon and hydrogen. They want coal and oil."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: "Really?"
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: The Astronomer said, quickly, "You are going to ask why creatures who have mastered space travel, and therefore atomic power, would want coal and oil. I can't answer that."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: The Industrialist smiled. "But I can. This is the best evidence yet of the truth of your story.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: Superficially, atomic power would seem to preclude the use of coal and oil. However, quite apart from the energy gained by their combustion they remain, and always will remain, the basic raw material for all organic chemistry. Plastics, dyes, pharmaceuticals, solvents. Industry could not exist without them, even in an atomic age."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: "Still, if coal and oil are the low price for which they would sell us the troubles and tortures of racial youth, my answer is that the commodity would be dear if offered gratis."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: The Astronomer sighed and said, "There are the boys!"
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: They were visible through the open window, standing together in the grassy field and lost in animated conversation.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: The Industrialist's son pointed imperiously and the Astronomer's son nodded and made off at a run toward the house.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: The Industrialist said, "There is the Youth you speak of. Our race has as much of it as it ever had."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: "Yes, but we age them quickly and pour them into the mold."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: Slim scuttled into the room, the door banging behind him.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: The Astronomer said, in mild disapproval, "What's this?"
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: Slim looked up in surprise and came to a halt. "I beg your pardon. I didn't know anyone was here. I am sorry to have interrupted."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: His enunciation was almost painfully precise.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: The Industrialist said, "It's all right, youngster."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: But the Astronomer said, "Even if you had been entering an empty room, son, there would be no cause for slamming a door."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: "Nonsense," insisted the Industrialist. "The youngster has done no harm. You simply scold him for being young. You, with your views!"
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: He said to Slim, "Come here, lad."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: Slim advanced slowly.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: "How do you like the country, eh?"
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: "Very much, sir, thank you."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: "My son has been showing you about the place, has he?"
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: "Yes, sir. Red--I mean--"
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: "No, no. Call him Red. I call him that myself. Now tell me, what are you two up to, eh?"
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: Slim looked away. "Why--just exploring, sir."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: The Industrialist turned to the Astronomer. "There you are, youthful curiosity and adventure-lust. The race has not yet lost it."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: Slim said, "Sir?"
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: "Yes, lad."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: The youngster took a long time in getting on with it.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: He said, "Red sent me in for something good to eat, but I don't exactly know what he meant. I didn't like to say so."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: "Why, just ask cook. She'll have something good for young'uns to eat."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: "Oh, no, sir. I mean for animals."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: "For animals?"
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: "Yes, sir. What do animals eat?"
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: The Astronomer said, "I am afraid my son is city-bred."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: "Well," said the Industrialist, "there's no harm in that. What kind of an animal, lad?"
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: "A small one, sir."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: "Then try grass or leaves, and if they don't want that, nuts or berries would probably do the trick."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: "Thank you, sir." Slim ran out again, closing the door gently behind him.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: The Astronomer said, "Do you suppose they've trapped an animal alive?" He was obviously perturbed.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: "That's common enough. There's no shooting on my estate and it's tame country, full of rodents and small creatures. Red is always coming home with pets of one sort or another.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: They rarely maintain his interest for long."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: He looked at the wall clock. "Your friends should have been here by now, shouldn't they?"
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: The swaying had come to a halt and it was dark. The Explorer was not comfortable in the alien air.
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: It felt as thick as soup and he had to breathe shallowly. Even so--
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: He reached out in a sudden need for company. The Merchant was warm to the touch.
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: His breathing was rough, he moved in an occasional spasm, and was obviously asleep.
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: The Explorer hesitated and decided not to wake him. It would serve no real purpose.
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: There would be no rescue, of course. That was the penalty paid for the high profits which unrestrained competition could lead to.
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: The Merchant who opened a new planet could have a ten year monopoly of its trade, which he might hug to himself or, more likely, rent out to all comers at a stiff price.
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: It followed that planets were searched for in secrecy and, preferably, away from the usual trade routes. In a case such as theirs, then, there was little or no chance that another ship would come within range of their subetherics except for the most improbable of coincidences.
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: Even if they were in their ship, that is, rather than in this--this--_cage_. The Explorer grasped the thick bars.
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: Even if they blasted those away, as they could, they would be stuck too high in open air for leaping.
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: It was too bad. They had landed twice before in the scout-ship.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship bridge, glowing control panels, large viewscreen showing distant planet, starfield

segment_text: They had established contact with the natives who were grotesquely huge, but mild and unaggressive.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship bridge, glowing control panels, large viewscreen showing distant planet, starfield

segment_text: It was obvious that they had once owned a flourishing technology, but hadn't faced up to the consequences of such a technology. It would have been a wonderful market.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship bridge, glowing control panels, large viewscreen showing distant planet, starfield

segment_text: And it was a tremendous world. The Merchant, especially, had been taken aback.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship bridge, glowing control panels, large viewscreen showing distant planet, starfield

segment_text: He had known the figures that expressed the planet's diameter, but from a distance of two light-seconds, he had stood at the visi-plate and muttered, "Unbelievable!"
scene_description: indoors, spaceship bridge, glowing control panels, large viewscreen showing distant planet, starfield

segment_text: "Oh, there are larger worlds," the Explorer said. It wouldn't do for an Explorer to be too easily impressed.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship bridge, glowing control panels, large viewscreen showing distant planet, starfield

segment_text: "Inhabited?"
scene_description: indoors, spaceship bridge, glowing control panels, large viewscreen showing distant planet, starfield

segment_text: "Well, no."
scene_description: indoors, spaceship bridge, glowing control panels, large viewscreen showing distant planet, starfield

segment_text: "Why, you could drop your planet into that large ocean and drown it."
scene_description: indoors, spaceship bridge, glowing control panels, large viewscreen showing distant planet, starfield

segment_text: The Explorer smiled. It was a gentle dig at his Arcturian homeland, which was smaller than most planets.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship bridge, glowing control panels, large viewscreen showing distant planet, starfield

segment_text: He said, "Not quite."
scene_description: indoors, spaceship bridge, glowing control panels, large viewscreen showing distant planet, starfield

segment_text: The Merchant followed along the line of his thoughts. "And the inhabitants are large in proportion to their world?" He sounded as though the news struck him less favorably now.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship bridge, glowing control panels, large viewscreen showing distant planet, starfield

segment_text: "Nearly ten times our height."
scene_description: indoors, spaceship bridge, glowing control panels, large viewscreen showing distant planet, starfield

segment_text: "Are you sure they are friendly?"
scene_description: indoors, spaceship bridge, glowing control panels, large viewscreen showing distant planet, starfield

segment_text: "That is hard to say. Friendship between alien intelligences is an imponderable. They are not dangerous, I think.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship bridge, glowing control panels, large viewscreen showing distant planet, starfield

segment_text: We've come across other groups that could not maintain equilibrium after the atomic war stage and you know the results. Introversion. Retreat. Gradual decadence and increasing gentleness."
scene_description: indoors, spaceship bridge, glowing control panels, large viewscreen showing distant planet, starfield

segment_text: "Even if they are such monsters?"
scene_description: indoors, spaceship bridge, glowing control panels, large viewscreen showing distant planet, starfield

segment_text: "The principle remains."
scene_description: indoors, spaceship bridge, glowing control panels, large viewscreen showing distant planet, starfield

segment_text: It was about then that the Explorer felt the heavy throbbing of the engines.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship cockpit viewport, fiery atmospheric entry, shaking metal frame, warning lights

segment_text: He frowned and said, "We are descending a bit too quickly."
scene_description: indoors, spaceship cockpit viewport, fiery atmospheric entry, shaking metal frame, warning lights

segment_text: There had been some speculation on the dangers of landing some hours before. The planetary target was a huge one for an oxygen-water world.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship cockpit viewport, fiery atmospheric entry, shaking metal frame, warning lights

segment_text: Though it lacked the size of the uninhabitable hydrogen-ammonia planets and its low density made its surface gravity fairly normal, its gravitational forces fell off but slowly with distance.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship cockpit viewport, fiery atmospheric entry, shaking metal frame, warning lights

segment_text: In short, its gravitational potential was high and the ship's Calculator was a run-of-the-mill model not designed to plot landing trajectories at that potential range.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship cockpit viewport, fiery atmospheric entry, shaking metal frame, warning lights

segment_text: That meant the Pilot would have to use manual controls.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship cockpit viewport, fiery atmospheric entry, shaking metal frame, warning lights

segment_text: It would have been wiser to install a more high-powered model, but that would have meant a trip to some outpost of civilization; lost time; perhaps a lost secret.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship cockpit viewport, fiery atmospheric entry, shaking metal frame, warning lights

segment_text: The Merchant demanded an immediate landing.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship cockpit viewport, fiery atmospheric entry, shaking metal frame, warning lights

segment_text: The Merchant felt it necessary to defend his position now. He said angrily to the Explorer, "Don't you think the Pilot knows his job? He landed you safely twice before."
scene_description: indoors, spaceship cockpit viewport, fiery atmospheric entry, shaking metal frame, warning lights

segment_text: Yes, thought the Explorer, in a scout-ship, not in this unmaneuverable freighter. Aloud, he said nothing.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship cockpit viewport, fiery atmospheric entry, shaking metal frame, warning lights

segment_text: He kept his eye on the visi-plate. They were descending too quickly.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship cockpit viewport, fiery atmospheric entry, shaking metal frame, warning lights

segment_text: There was no room for doubt. Much too quickly.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship cockpit viewport, fiery atmospheric entry, shaking metal frame, warning lights

segment_text: The Merchant said, peevishly, "Why do you keep silence?"
scene_description: indoors, spaceship cockpit viewport, fiery atmospheric entry, shaking metal frame, warning lights

segment_text: "Well, then, if you wish me to speak, I would suggest that you strap on your Floater and help me prepare the Ejector."
scene_description: indoors, spaceship cockpit viewport, fiery atmospheric entry, shaking metal frame, warning lights

segment_text: The Pilot fought a noble fight. He was no beginner.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship cockpit viewport, fiery atmospheric entry, shaking metal frame, warning lights

segment_text: The atmosphere, abnormally high and thick in the gravitational potential of this world whipped and burned about the ship, but to the very last it looked as though he might bring it under control despite that.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship cockpit viewport, fiery atmospheric entry, shaking metal frame, warning lights

segment_text: He even maintained course, following the extrapolated line to the point on the northern continent toward which they were headed.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship cockpit viewport, fiery atmospheric entry, shaking metal frame, warning lights

segment_text: Under other circumstances, with a shade more luck, the story would eventually have been told and retold as a heroic and masterly reversal of a lost situation.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship cockpit viewport, fiery atmospheric entry, shaking metal frame, warning lights

segment_text: But within sight of victory, tired body and tired nerves clamped a control bar with a shade too much pressure.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship cockpit viewport, fiery atmospheric entry, shaking metal frame, warning lights

segment_text: The ship, which had almost levelled off, dipped down again.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship cockpit viewport, fiery atmospheric entry, shaking metal frame, warning lights

segment_text: There was no room to retrieve the final error. There was only a mile left to fall.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship cockpit viewport, fiery atmospheric entry, shaking metal frame, warning lights

segment_text: The Pilot remained at his post to the actual landing, his only thought that of breaking the force of the crash, of maintaining the spaceworthiness of the vessel.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship cockpit viewport, fiery atmospheric entry, shaking metal frame, warning lights

segment_text: He did not survive. With the ship bucking madly in a soupy atmosphere, few Ejectors could be mobilized and only one of them in time.
scene_description: indoors, spaceship cockpit viewport, fiery atmospheric entry, shaking metal frame, warning lights

segment_text: When afterwards, the Explorer lifted out of unconsciousness and rose to his feet, he had the definite feeling that but for himself and the Merchant, there were no survivors.
scene_description: outdoors, alien jungle, towering ropy grass stalks, immense tree trunks, dim hazy light

segment_text: And perhaps that was an over-calculation. His Floater had burnt out while still sufficiently distant from surface to have the fall stun him.
scene_description: outdoors, alien jungle, towering ropy grass stalks, immense tree trunks, dim hazy light

segment_text: The Merchant might have had less luck, even, than that.
scene_description: outdoors, alien jungle, towering ropy grass stalks, immense tree trunks, dim hazy light

segment_text: He was surrounded by a world of thick, ropy stalks of grass, and in the distance were trees that reminded him vaguely of similar structures on his native Arcturian world except that their lowest branches were high above what he would consider normal tree-tops.
scene_description: outdoors, alien jungle, towering ropy grass stalks, immense tree trunks, dim hazy light

segment_text: He called, his voice sounding basso in the thick air and the Merchant answered.
scene_description: outdoors, alien jungle, towering ropy grass stalks, immense tree trunks, dim hazy light

segment_text: The Explorer made his way toward him, thrusting violently at the coarse stalks that barred his path.
scene_description: outdoors, alien jungle, towering ropy grass stalks, immense tree trunks, dim hazy light

segment_text: "Are you hurt?" he asked.
scene_description: outdoors, alien jungle, towering ropy grass stalks, immense tree trunks, dim hazy light

segment_text: The Merchant grimaced. "I've sprained something. It hurts to walk."
scene_description: outdoors, alien jungle, towering ropy grass stalks, immense tree trunks, dim hazy light

segment_text: The Explorer probed gently. "I don't think anything is broken. You'll have to walk despite the pain."
scene_description: outdoors, alien jungle, towering ropy grass stalks, immense tree trunks, dim hazy light

segment_text: "Can't we rest first?"
scene_description: outdoors, alien jungle, towering ropy grass stalks, immense tree trunks, dim hazy light

segment_text: "It's important to try to find the ship. If it is spaceworthy or if it can be repaired, we may live. Otherwise, we won't."
scene_description: outdoors, alien jungle, towering ropy grass stalks, immense tree trunks, dim hazy light

segment_text: "Just a few minutes. Let me catch my breath."
scene_description: outdoors, alien jungle, towering ropy grass stalks, immense tree trunks, dim hazy light

segment_text: The Explorer was glad enough for those few minutes. The Merchant's eyes were already closed.
scene_description: outdoors, alien jungle, towering ropy grass stalks, immense tree trunks, dim hazy light

segment_text: He allowed his to do the same.
scene_description: outdoors, alien jungle, towering ropy grass stalks, immense tree trunks, dim hazy light

segment_text: He heard the trampling and his eyes snapped open. Never sleep on a strange planet, he told himself futilely.
scene_description: outdoors, alien jungle, towering ropy grass stalks, immense tree trunks, dim hazy light

segment_text: The Merchant was awake too and his steady screaming was a rumble of terror.
scene_description: outdoors, alien jungle, towering ropy grass stalks, immense tree trunks, dim hazy light

segment_text: The Explorer called, "It's only a native of this planet. It won't harm you."
scene_description: outdoors, alien jungle, towering ropy grass stalks, immense tree trunks, dim hazy light

segment_text: But even as he spoke, the giant had swooped down and in a moment they were in its grasp being lifted closer to its monstrous ugliness.
scene_description: outdoors, alien jungle, towering ropy grass stalks, immense tree trunks, dim hazy light

segment_text: The Merchant struggled violently and, of course, quite futilely. "Can't you talk to it?" he yelled.
scene_description: outdoors, alien jungle, towering ropy grass stalks, immense tree trunks, dim hazy light

segment_text: The Explorer could only shake his head. "I can't reach it with the Projector. It won't be listening."
scene_description: outdoors, alien jungle, towering ropy grass stalks, immense tree trunks, dim hazy light

segment_text: "Then blast it. Blast it down."
scene_description: outdoors, alien jungle, towering ropy grass stalks, immense tree trunks, dim hazy light

segment_text: "We can't do that." The phrase "you fool" had almost been added.
scene_description: outdoors, alien jungle, towering ropy grass stalks, immense tree trunks, dim hazy light

segment_text: The Explorer struggled to keep his self-control. They were swallowing space as the monster moved purposefully away.
scene_description: outdoors, alien jungle, towering ropy grass stalks, immense tree trunks, dim hazy light

segment_text: "Why not?" cried the Merchant. "You can reach your blaster. I see it in plain sight. Don't be afraid of falling."
scene_description: outdoors, alien jungle, towering ropy grass stalks, immense tree trunks, dim hazy light

segment_text: "It's simpler than that. If this monster is killed, you'll never trade with this planet. You'll never even leave it. You probably won't live the day out."
scene_description: outdoors, alien jungle, towering ropy grass stalks, immense tree trunks, dim hazy light

segment_text: "Why? Why?"
scene_description: outdoors, alien jungle, towering ropy grass stalks, immense tree trunks, dim hazy light

segment_text: "Because this is one of the young of the species. You should know what happens when a trader kills a native young, even accidentally.
scene_description: outdoors, alien jungle, towering ropy grass stalks, immense tree trunks, dim hazy light

segment_text: What's more, if this is the target-point, then we are on the estate of a powerful native. This might be one of his brood."
scene_description: outdoors, alien jungle, towering ropy grass stalks, immense tree trunks, dim hazy light

segment_text: That was how they entered their present prison. They had carefully burnt away a portion of the thick, stiff covering and it was obvious that the height from which they were suspended was a killing one.
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: Now, once again, the prison-cage shuddered and lifted in an upward arc. The Merchant rolled to the lower rim and startled awake.
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: The cover lifted and light flooded in. As was the case the time before, there were two specimens of the young.
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: They were not very different in appearance from adults of the species, reflected the Explorer, though, of course, they were considerably smaller.
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: A handful of reedy green stalks was stuffed between the bars. Its odor was not unpleasant but it carried clods of soil at its ends.
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: The Merchant drew away and said, huskily, "What are they doing?"
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: The Explorer said, "Trying to feed us, I should judge. At least this seems to be the native equivalent of grass."
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: The cover was replaced and they were set swinging again, alone with their fodder.
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: Slim started at the sound of footsteps and brightened when it turned out to be only Red.
scene_description: outdoors, weathered wooden barn wall, large dark doorway, overgrown grass path

segment_text: He said, "No one's around. I had my eye peeled, you bet."
scene_description: outdoors, weathered wooden barn wall, large dark doorway, overgrown grass path

segment_text: Red said, "Ssh. Look. You take this stuff and stick it in the cage. I've got to scoot back to the house."
scene_description: outdoors, weathered wooden barn wall, large dark doorway, overgrown grass path

segment_text: "What is it?" Slim reached reluctantly.
scene_description: outdoors, weathered wooden barn wall, large dark doorway, overgrown grass path

segment_text: "Ground meat. Holy Smokes, haven't you ever seen ground meat? That's what you should've got when I sent you to the house instead of coming back with that stupid grass."
scene_description: outdoors, weathered wooden barn wall, large dark doorway, overgrown grass path

segment_text: Slim was hurt. "How'd I know they don't eat grass. Besides, ground meat doesn't come loose like that. It comes in cellophane and it isn't that color."
scene_description: outdoors, weathered wooden barn wall, large dark doorway, overgrown grass path

segment_text: "Sure--in the city. Out here we grind our own and it's always this color till it's cooked."
scene_description: outdoors, weathered wooden barn wall, large dark doorway, overgrown grass path

segment_text: "You mean it isn't cooked?" Slim drew away quickly.
scene_description: outdoors, weathered wooden barn wall, large dark doorway, overgrown grass path

segment_text: Red looked disgusted. "Do you think animals eat _cooked_ food. Come on, take it. It won't hurt you. I tell you there isn't much time."
scene_description: outdoors, weathered wooden barn wall, large dark doorway, overgrown grass path

segment_text: "Why? What's doing back at the house?"
scene_description: outdoors, weathered wooden barn wall, large dark doorway, overgrown grass path

segment_text: "I don't know. Dad and your father are walking around. I think maybe they're looking for me. Maybe the cook told them I took the meat.
scene_description: outdoors, weathered wooden barn wall, large dark doorway, overgrown grass path

segment_text: Anyway, we don't want them coming here after me."
scene_description: outdoors, weathered wooden barn wall, large dark doorway, overgrown grass path

segment_text: "Didn't you ask the cook before you took this stuff?"
scene_description: outdoors, weathered wooden barn wall, large dark doorway, overgrown grass path

segment_text: "Who? That crab? Shouldn't wonder if she only let me have a drink of water because Dad makes her. Come on. Take it."
scene_description: outdoors, weathered wooden barn wall, large dark doorway, overgrown grass path

segment_text: Slim took the large glob of meat though his skin crawled at the touch. He turned toward the barn and Red sped away in the direction from which he had come.
scene_description: outdoors, weathered wooden barn wall, large dark doorway, overgrown grass path

segment_text: He slowed when he approached the two adults, took a few deep breaths to bring himself back to normal, and then carefully and nonchalantly sauntered past.
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: (They were walking in the general direction of the barn, he noticed, but not dead on.)
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: He said, "Hi, Dad. Hello, sir."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: The Industrialist said, "Just a moment, Red. I have a question to ask you?"
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: Red turned a carefully blank face to his father. "Yes, Dad?"
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "Mother tells me you were out early this morning."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "Not real early, Dad. Just a little before breakfast."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "She said you told her it was because you had been awakened during the night and didn't go back to sleep."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: Red waited before answering. Should he have told Mom that?
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: Then he said, "Yes, sir."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "What was it that awakened you?"
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: Red saw no harm in it. He said, "I don't know, Dad. It sounded like thunder, sort of, and like a collision, sort of."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "Could you tell where it came from?"
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "It _sounded_ like it was out by the hill." That was truthful, and useful as well, since the direction was almost opposite that in which the barn lay.
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: The Industrialist looked at his guest. "I suppose it would do no harm to walk toward the hill."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: The Astronomer said, "I am ready."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: Red watched them walk away and when he turned he saw Slim peering cautiously out from among the briars of a hedge.
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: Red waved at him. "Come on."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: Slim stepped out and approached. "Did they say anything about the meat?"
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "No. I guess they don't know about that. They went down to the hill."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "What for?"
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "Search me. They kept asking about the noise I heard. Listen, did the animals eat the meat?"
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "Well," said Slim, cautiously, "they were sort of _looking_ at it and smelling it or something."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "Okay," Red said, "I guess they'll eat it. Holy Smokes, they've got to eat _something_.
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: Let's walk along toward the hill and see what Dad and your father are going to do."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "What about the animals?"
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "They'll be all right. A fellow can't spend all his time on them. Did you give them water?"
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "Sure. They drank that."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "See. Come on. We'll look at them after lunch. I tell you what. We'll bring them fruit. Anything'll eat fruit."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: Together they trotted up the rise, Red, as usual, in the lead.
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: The Astronomer said, "You think the noise was their ship landing?"
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "Don't you think it could be?"
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "If it were, they may all be dead."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "Perhaps not." The Industrialist frowned.
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "If they have landed, and are still alive, where are they?"
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "Think about that for a while." He was still frowning.
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: The Astronomer said, "I don't understand you."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "They may not be friendly."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "Oh, no. I've spoken with them. They've--"
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "You've spoken with them. Call that reconnaissance. What would their next step be? Invasion?"
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "But they only have one ship, sir."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "You know that only because they say so. They might have a fleet."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "I've told you about their size. They--"
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "Their size would not matter, if they have handweapons that may well be superior to our artillery."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "That is not what I meant."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "I had this partly in mind from the first." The Industrialist went on.
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "It is for that reason I agreed to see them after I received your letter. Not to agree to an unsettling and impossible trade, but to judge their real purposes. I did not count on their evading the meeting."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: He sighed. "I suppose it isn't our fault. You are right in one thing, at any rate. The world has been at peace too long. We are losing a healthy sense of suspicion."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: The Astronomer's mild voice rose to an unusual pitch and he said, "I _will_ speak. I tell you that there is no reason to suppose they can possibly be hostile.
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: They are small, yes, but that is only important because it is a reflection of the fact that their native worlds are small. Our world has what is for them a normal gravity, but because of our much higher gravitational potential, our atmosphere is too dense to support them comfortably over sustained periods."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "For a similar reason the use of the world as a base for interstellar travel, except for trade in certain items, is uneconomical. And there are important differences in chemistry of life due to the basic differences in soils.
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: They couldn't eat our food or we theirs."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "Surely all this can be overcome. They can bring their own food, build domed stations of lowered air pressure, devise specially designed ships."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "They can. And how glibly you can describe feats that are easy to a race in its youth. It is simply that they don't have to do any of that.
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: There are millions of worlds suitable for them in the Galaxy. They don't need this one which isn't."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "How do you know? All this is their information again."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "This I was able to check independently. I am an astronomer, after all."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "That is true. Let me hear what you have to say then, while we walk."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "Then, sir, consider that for a long time our astronomers have believed that two general classes of planetary bodies existed. First, the planets which formed at distances far enough from their stellar nucleus to become cool enough to capture hydrogen.
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: These would be large planets rich in hydrogen, ammonia and methane. We have examples of these in the giant outer planets."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: "The second class would include those planets formed so near the stellar center that the high temperature would make it impossible to capture much hydrogen. These would be smaller planets, comparatively poorer in hydrogen and richer in oxygen.
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: We know that type
scene_description: outdoors, grassy fields, distant low hills, early morning light, dew on grass

segment_text: very well since we live on one.
scene_description: outdoors, path among trees, green foliage, sunlit

segment_text: Ours is the only solar system we know in detail, however, and it has been reasonable for us to assume that these were the _only_ two planetary classes."
scene_description: outdoors, path among trees, green foliage, sunlit

segment_text: "I take it then that there is another."
scene_description: outdoors, path among trees, green foliage, sunlit

segment_text: "Yes. There is a super-dense class, still smaller, poorer in hydrogen, than the inner planets of the solar system.
scene_description: outdoors, path among trees, green foliage, sunlit

segment_text: The ratio of occurrence of hydrogen-ammonia planets and these super-dense water-oxygen worlds of theirs over the entire Galaxy--and remember that they have actually conducted a survey of significant sample volumes of the Galaxy which we, without interstellar travel, cannot do--is about 3 to 1.
scene_description: outdoors, path among trees, green foliage, sunlit

segment_text: This leaves them seven million super-dense worlds for exploration and colonization."
scene_description: outdoors, path among trees, green foliage, sunlit

segment_text: The Industrialist looked at the blue sky and the green-covered trees among which they were making their way.
scene_description: outdoors, path among trees, green foliage, sunlit

segment_text: He said, "And worlds like ours?"
scene_description: outdoors, path among trees, green foliage, sunlit

segment_text: The Astronomer said, softly, "Ours is the first solar system they have found which contains them. Apparently the development of our solar system was unique and did not follow the ordinary rules."
scene_description: outdoors, path among trees, green foliage, sunlit

segment_text: The Industrialist considered that.
scene_description: outdoors, path among trees, green foliage, sunlit

segment_text: "What it amounts to is that these creatures from space are asteroid-dwellers."
scene_description: outdoors, path among trees, green foliage, sunlit

segment_text: "No, no. The asteroids are something else again.
scene_description: outdoors, path among trees, green foliage, sunlit

segment_text: They occur, I was told, in one out of eight stellar systems, but they're completely different from what we've been discussing."
scene_description: outdoors, path among trees, green foliage, sunlit

segment_text: "And how does your being an astronomer change the fact that you are still only quoting their unsupported statements?"
scene_description: outdoors, path among trees, green foliage, sunlit

segment_text: "But they did not restrict themselves to bald items of information. They presented me with a theory of stellar evolution which I had to accept and which is more nearly valid than anything our own astronomy has ever been able to devise, if we except possible lost theories dating from Beforethewars.
scene_description: outdoors, path among trees, green foliage, sunlit

segment_text: Mind you, their theory had a rigidly mathematical development and it predicted just such a Galaxy as they describe. So you see, they have all the worlds they wish.
scene_description: outdoors, path among trees, green foliage, sunlit

segment_text: They are not land-hungry. Certainly not for our land."
scene_description: outdoors, path among trees, green foliage, sunlit

segment_text: "Reason would say so, if what you say is true. But creatures may be intelligent and not reasonable.
scene_description: outdoors, path among trees, green foliage, sunlit

segment_text: Our forefathers were presumably intelligent, yet they were certainly not reasonable. Was it reasonable to destroy almost all their tremendous civilization in atomic warfare over causes our historians can no longer accurately determine?"
scene_description: outdoors, path among trees, green foliage, sunlit

segment_text: The Industrialist brooded over it.
scene_description: outdoors, path among trees, green foliage, sunlit

segment_text: "From the dropping of the first atom bomb over those islands--I forget the ancient name--there was only one end in sight, and in plain sight. Yet events were allowed to proceed to that end."
scene_description: outdoors, path among trees, green foliage, sunlit

segment_text: He looked up, said briskly, "Well, where are we? I wonder if we are not on a fool's errand after all."
scene_description: outdoors, path among trees, green foliage, sunlit

segment_text: But the Astronomer was a little in advance and his voice came thickly. "No fool's errand, sir. Look there."
scene_description: outdoors, path among trees, green foliage, sunlit

segment_text: Red and Slim had trailed their elders with the experience of youth, aided by the absorption and anxiety of their fathers.
scene_description: outdoors, dense undergrowth, metallic gleam beyond, dappled light

segment_text: Their view of the final object of the search was somewhat obscured by the underbrush behind which they remained.
scene_description: outdoors, dense undergrowth, metallic gleam beyond, dappled light

segment_text: Red said, "Holy Smokes. Look at that. It's all shiny silver or something."
scene_description: outdoors, dense undergrowth, metallic gleam beyond, dappled light

segment_text: But it was Slim who was really excited. He caught at the other.
scene_description: outdoors, dense undergrowth, metallic gleam beyond, dappled light

segment_text: "I know what this is. It's a space-ship. That must be why my father came here.
scene_description: outdoors, dense undergrowth, metallic gleam beyond, dappled light

segment_text: He's one of the biggest astronomers in the world and your father would have to call him if a space-ship landed on his estate."
scene_description: outdoors, dense undergrowth, metallic gleam beyond, dappled light

segment_text: "What are you talking about? Dad didn't even know that thing was there.
scene_description: outdoors, dense undergrowth, metallic gleam beyond, dappled light

segment_text: He only came here because I told him I heard the thunder from here. Besides, there isn't any such thing as a space-ship."
scene_description: outdoors, dense undergrowth, metallic gleam beyond, dappled light

segment_text: "Sure, there is. Look at it. See those round things.
scene_description: outdoors, dense undergrowth, metallic gleam beyond, dappled light

segment_text: They are ports. And you can see the rocket tubes."
scene_description: outdoors, dense undergrowth, metallic gleam beyond, dappled light

segment_text: "How do you know so much?"
scene_description: outdoors, dense undergrowth, metallic gleam beyond, dappled light

segment_text: Slim was flushed. He said, "I read about them. My father has books about them.
scene_description: outdoors, dense undergrowth, metallic gleam beyond, dappled light

segment_text: Old books. From Beforethewars."
scene_description: outdoors, dense undergrowth, metallic gleam beyond, dappled light

segment_text: "Huh. Now I know you're making it up. Books from Beforethewars!"
