scene_description: outdoors, dense undergrowth, metallic gleam beyond, dappled light

segment_text: "My father _has_ to have them. He teaches at the University. It's his job."
scene_description: outdoors, dense undergrowth, metallic gleam beyond, dappled light

segment_text: His voice had risen and Red had to pull at him. "You want them to hear us?" he whispered indignantly.
scene_description: outdoors, dense undergrowth, metallic gleam beyond, dappled light

segment_text: "Well, it is, too, a space-ship."
scene_description: outdoors, dense undergrowth, metallic gleam beyond, dappled light

segment_text: "Look here, Slim, you mean that's a ship from another world."
scene_description: outdoors, dense undergrowth, metallic gleam beyond, dappled light

segment_text: "It's _got_ to be. Look at my father going round and round it. He wouldn't be so interested if it was anything else."
scene_description: outdoors, dense undergrowth, metallic gleam beyond, dappled light

segment_text: "Other worlds! Where are there other worlds?"
scene_description: outdoors, dense undergrowth, metallic gleam beyond, dappled light

segment_text: "Everywhere. How about the planets? They're worlds just like ours, some of them.
scene_description: outdoors, dense undergrowth, metallic gleam beyond, dappled light

segment_text: And other stars probably have planets. There's probably zillions of planets."
scene_description: outdoors, dense undergrowth, metallic gleam beyond, dappled light

segment_text: Red felt outweighed and outnumbered. He muttered, "You're crazy!"
scene_description: outdoors, dense undergrowth, metallic gleam beyond, dappled light

segment_text: "All right, then. I'll show you."
scene_description: outdoors, dense undergrowth, metallic gleam beyond, dappled light

segment_text: "Hey! Where are you going?"
scene_description: outdoors, dense undergrowth, metallic gleam beyond, dappled light

segment_text: "Down there. I'm going to ask my father. I suppose you'll believe it if _he_ tells you.
scene_description: outdoors, dense undergrowth, metallic gleam beyond, dappled light

segment_text: I suppose you'll believe a Professor of Astronomy knows what--" He had scrambled upright.
scene_description: outdoors, dense undergrowth, metallic gleam beyond, dappled light

segment_text: Red said, "Hey. You don't want them to see us. We're not supposed to be here.
scene_description: outdoors, dense undergrowth, metallic gleam beyond, dappled light

segment_text: Do you want them to start asking questions and find out about our animals?"
scene_description: outdoors, dense undergrowth, metallic gleam beyond, dappled light

segment_text: "I don't care. You said I was crazy."
scene_description: outdoors, dense undergrowth, metallic gleam beyond, dappled light

segment_text: "Snitcher! You promised you wouldn't tell."
scene_description: outdoors, dense undergrowth, metallic gleam beyond, dappled light

segment_text: "I'm _not_ going to tell. But if they find out themselves, it's your fault, for starting an argument and saying I was crazy."
scene_description: outdoors, dense undergrowth, metallic gleam beyond, dappled light

segment_text: "I take it back, then," grumbled Red.
scene_description: outdoors, dense undergrowth, metallic gleam beyond, dappled light

segment_text: "Well, all right. You better."
scene_description: outdoors, dense undergrowth, metallic gleam beyond, dappled light

segment_text: In a way, Slim was disappointed. He wanted to see the space-ship at closer quarters.
scene_description: outdoors, dense undergrowth, metallic gleam beyond, dappled light

segment_text: Still, he could not break his vow of secrecy even in spirit without at least the excuse of personal insult.
scene_description: outdoors, dense undergrowth, metallic gleam beyond, dappled light

segment_text: Red said, "It's awfully small for a space-ship."
scene_description: outdoors, dense undergrowth, metallic gleam beyond, dappled light

segment_text: "Sure, because it's probably a scout-ship."
scene_description: outdoors, dense undergrowth, metallic gleam beyond, dappled light

segment_text: "I'll bet Dad couldn't even get into the old thing."
scene_description: outdoors, dense undergrowth, metallic gleam beyond, dappled light

segment_text: So much Slim realized to be true. It was a weak point in his argument and he made no answer.
scene_description: outdoors, dense undergrowth, metallic gleam beyond, dappled light

segment_text: His interest was absorbed by the adults.
scene_description: outdoors, dense undergrowth, metallic gleam beyond, dappled light

segment_text: Red rose to his feet; an elaborate attitude of boredom all about him.
scene_description: outdoors, dense undergrowth, metallic gleam beyond, dappled light

segment_text: "Well, I guess we better be going. There's business to do and I can't spend all day here looking at some old space-ship or whatever it is.
scene_description: outdoors, dense undergrowth, metallic gleam beyond, dappled light

segment_text: We've got to take care of the animals if we're going to be circus-folks. That's the first rule with circus-folks.
scene_description: outdoors, dense undergrowth, metallic gleam beyond, dappled light

segment_text: They've got to take care of the animals. And," he finished virtuously, "that's what I aim to do, anyway."
scene_description: outdoors, dense undergrowth, metallic gleam beyond, dappled light

segment_text: Slim said, "What for, Red? They've got plenty of meat. Let's watch."
scene_description: outdoors, dense undergrowth, metallic gleam beyond, dappled light

segment_text: "There's no fun in watching. Besides Dad and your father are going away and I guess it's about lunch time."
scene_description: outdoors, dense undergrowth, metallic gleam beyond, dappled light

segment_text: Red became argumentative. "Look, Slim, we can't start acting suspicious or they're going to start investigating.
scene_description: outdoors, dense undergrowth, metallic gleam beyond, dappled light

segment_text: Holy Smokes, don't you ever read any detective stories? When you're trying to work a big deal without being caught, it's practically the main thing to keep on acting just like always.
scene_description: outdoors, dense undergrowth, metallic gleam beyond, dappled light

segment_text: Then they don't suspect anything. That's the first law--"
scene_description: outdoors, dense undergrowth, metallic gleam beyond, dappled light

segment_text: "Oh, all right."
scene_description: outdoors, dense undergrowth, metallic gleam beyond, dappled light

segment_text: Slim rose resentfully. At the moment, the circus appeared to him a rather tawdry and shoddy substitute for the glories of astronomy, and he wondered how he had come to fall in with Red's silly scheme.
scene_description: outdoors, dense undergrowth, metallic gleam beyond, dappled light

segment_text: Down the slope they went, Slim, as usual, in the rear.
scene_description: outdoors, dense undergrowth, metallic gleam beyond, dappled light

segment_text: The Industrialist said, "It's the workmanship that gets me. I never saw such construction."
scene_description: outdoors, damaged metallic spacecraft, disturbed earth, surrounding trees

segment_text: "What good is it now?" said the Astronomer, bitterly. "There's nothing left. There'll be no second landing.
scene_description: outdoors, damaged metallic spacecraft, disturbed earth, surrounding trees

segment_text: This ship detected life on our planet through accident. Other exploring parties would come no closer than necessary to establish the fact that there were no super-dense worlds existing in our solar system."
scene_description: outdoors, damaged metallic spacecraft, disturbed earth, surrounding trees

segment_text: "Well, there's no quarreling with a crash landing."
scene_description: outdoors, damaged metallic spacecraft, disturbed earth, surrounding trees

segment_text: "The ship hardly seems damaged. If only some had survived, the ship might have been repaired."
scene_description: outdoors, damaged metallic spacecraft, disturbed earth, surrounding trees

segment_text: "If they had survived, there would be no trade in any case. They're too different. Too disturbing.
scene_description: outdoors, damaged metallic spacecraft, disturbed earth, surrounding trees

segment_text: In any case--it's over."
scene_description: outdoors, damaged metallic spacecraft, disturbed earth, surrounding trees

segment_text: They entered the house and the Industrialist greeted his wife calmly. "Lunch about ready, dear."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: "I'm afraid not. You see--" She looked hesitantly at the Astronomer.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: "Is anything wrong?" asked the Industrialist. "Why not tell me? I'm sure our guest won't mind a little family discussion."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: "Pray don't pay any attention whatever to me," muttered the Astronomer. He moved miserably to the other end of the living room.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: The woman said, in low, hurried tones, "Really, dear, cook's that upset. I've been soothing her for hours and honestly, I don't know why Red should have done it."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: "Done what?" The Industrialist was more amused than otherwise.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: It had taken the united efforts of himself and his son months to argue his wife into using the name "Red" rather than the perfectly ridiculous (viewed youngster fashion) name which was his real one.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: She said, "He's taken most of the chopped meat."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: "He's eaten it?"
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: "Well, I hope not. It was raw."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: "Then what would he want it for?"
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: "I haven't the slightest idea. I haven't seen him since breakfast.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: Meanwhile cook's just furious. She caught him vanishing out the kitchen door and there was the bowl of chopped meat just about empty and she was going to use it for lunch.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: Well, you know cook. She had to change the lunch menu and that means she won't be worth living with for a week.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: You'll just have to speak to Red, dear, and make him promise not to do things in the kitchen any more. And it wouldn't hurt to have him apologize to cook."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: "Oh, come. She works for us. If we don't complain about a change in lunch menu, why should she?"
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: "Because she's the one who has double-work made for her, and she's talking about quitting. Good cooks aren't easy to get.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: Do you remember the one before her?" It was a strong argument.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: The Industrialist looked about vaguely. He said, "I suppose you're right. He isn't here, I suppose.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: When he comes in, I'll talk to him."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: "You'd better start. Here he comes."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: Red walked into the house and said cheerfully, "Time for lunch, I guess." He looked from one parent to the other in quick speculation at their fixed stares and said, "Got to clean up first, though," and made for the other door.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: The Industrialist said, "One moment, son."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: "Sir?"
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: "Where's your little friend?"
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: Red said, carelessly, "He's around somewhere. We were just sort of walking and I looked around and he wasn't there." This was perfectly true, and Red felt on safe ground.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: "I told him it was lunch time. I said, 'I suppose it's about lunch time.' I said, 'We got to be getting back to the house.'
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: And he said, 'Yes.' And I just went on and then when I was about at the creek I looked around and--"
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: The Astronomer interrupted the voluble story, looking up from a magazine he had been sightlessly rummaging through. "I wouldn't worry about my youngster.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: He is quite self-reliant. Don't wait lunch for him."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: "Lunch isn't ready in any case, Doctor." The Industrialist turned once more to his son.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: "And talking about that, son, the reason for it is that something happened to the ingredients. Do you have anything to say?"
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: "Sir?"
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: "I hate to feel that I have to explain myself more fully. Why did you take the chopped meat?"
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: "The chopped meat?"
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: "The chopped meat." He waited patiently.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: Red said, "Well, I was sort of--"
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: "Hungry?" prompted his father. "For raw meat?"
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: "No, sir. I just sort of needed it."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: "For what exactly?" Red looked miserable and remained silent.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: The Astronomer broke in again. "If you don't mind my putting in a few words--You'll remember that just after breakfast my son came in to ask what animals ate."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: "Oh, you're right. How stupid of me to forget. Look here, Red, did you take it for an animal pet you've got?"
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: Red recovered indignant breath. He said, "You mean Slim came in here and said I had an animal? He came in here and said that?
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: He said I had an animal?"
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: "No, he didn't. He simply asked what animals ate. That's all.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: Now if he promised he wouldn't tell on you, he didn't. It's your own foolishness in trying to take something without permission that gave you away.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: That happened to be stealing. Now have you an animal? I ask you a direct question."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: "Yes, sir." It was a whisper so low as hardly to be heard.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: "All right, you'll have to get rid of it. Do you understand?"
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: Red's mother intervened. "Do you mean to say you're keeping a meat-eating animal, Red? It might bite you and give you blood-poison."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: "They're only small ones," quavered Red. "They hardly budge if you touch them."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: "They? How many do you have?"
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: "Two."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: "Where are they?"
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: The Industrialist touched her arm. "Don't chivvy the child any further," he said, in a low voice.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: "If he says he'll get rid of them, he will, and that's punishment enough." He dismissed the matter from his mind.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: Lunch was half over when Slim dashed into the dining room.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: For a moment, he stood abashed, and then he said in what was almost hysteria, "I've got to speak to Red. I've got to say something."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: Red looked up in fright, but the Astronomer said, "I don't think, son, you're being very polite. You've kept lunch waiting."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: "I'm sorry, Father."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: "Oh, don't rate the lad," said the Industrialist's wife. "He can speak to Red if he wants to, and there was no damage done to the lunch."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: "I've got to speak to Red alone," Slim insisted.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: "Now that's enough," said the Astronomer with a kind of gentleness that was obviously manufactured for the benefit of strangers and which had beneath it an easily-recognized edge. "Take your seat."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: Slim did so, but he ate only when someone looked directly upon him. Even then he was not very successful.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: Red caught his eyes. He made soundless words, "Did the animals get loose?"
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: Slim shook his head slightly. He whispered, "No, it's--"
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: The Astronomer looked at him hard and Slim faltered to a stop.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: With lunch over, Red slipped out of the room, with a microscopic motion at Slim to follow.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit dining room, large window, view of green fields, polished wood furniture

segment_text: They walked in silence to the creek.
scene_description: outdoors, grassy creek bank, flowing water, distant trees

segment_text: Then Red turned fiercely upon his companion. "Look here, what's the idea of telling my Dad we were feeding animals?"
scene_description: outdoors, grassy creek bank, flowing water, distant trees

segment_text: Slim said, "I didn't. I asked what you feed animals. That's not the same as saying we were doing it.
scene_description: outdoors, grassy creek bank, flowing water, distant trees

segment_text: Besides, it's something else, Red." But Red had not used up his grievances.
scene_description: outdoors, grassy creek bank, flowing water, distant trees

segment_text: "And where did you go anyway? I thought you were coming to the house. They acted like it was my fault you weren't there."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy creek bank, flowing water, distant trees

segment_text: "But I'm trying to tell you about that, if you'd only shut _up_ a second and let me talk. You don't give a fellow a chance."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy creek bank, flowing water, distant trees

segment_text: "Well, go on and tell me if you've got so much to say."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy creek bank, flowing water, distant trees

segment_text: "I'm _trying_ to. I went back to the space-ship. The folks weren't there anymore and I wanted to see what it was like."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy creek bank, flowing water, distant trees

segment_text: "It isn't a space-ship," said Red, sullenly. He had nothing to lose.
scene_description: outdoors, grassy creek bank, flowing water, distant trees

segment_text: "It is, too. I looked inside. You could look through the ports and I looked inside and they were _dead_." He looked sick.
scene_description: outdoors, grassy creek bank, flowing water, distant trees

segment_text: "They were dead." "_Who_ were dead."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy creek bank, flowing water, distant trees

segment_text: Slim screeched, "Animals! like _our_ animals! Only they _aren't_ animals.
scene_description: outdoors, grassy creek bank, flowing water, distant trees

segment_text: They're people-things from other planets."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy creek bank, flowing water, distant trees

segment_text: For a moment Red might have been turned to stone. It didn't occur to him to disbelieve Slim at this point.
scene_description: outdoors, grassy creek bank, flowing water, distant trees

segment_text: Slim looked too genuinely the bearer of just such tidings. He said, finally, "Oh, my."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy creek bank, flowing water, distant trees

segment_text: "Well, what are we going to do? Golly, will we get a whopping if they find out?" He was shivering.
scene_description: outdoors, grassy creek bank, flowing water, distant trees

segment_text: "We better turn them loose," said Red.
scene_description: outdoors, grassy creek bank, flowing water, distant trees

segment_text: "They'll tell on us."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy creek bank, flowing water, distant trees

segment_text: "They can't talk our language. Not if they're from another planet."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy creek bank, flowing water, distant trees

segment_text: "Yes, they can. Because I remember my father talking about some stuff like that to my mother when he didn't know I was in the room.
scene_description: outdoors, grassy creek bank, flowing water, distant trees

segment_text: He was talking about visitors who could talk with the mind. Telepathery or something. I thought he was making it up."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy creek bank, flowing water, distant trees

segment_text: "Well, Holy Smokes. I mean--Holy Smokes." Red looked up.
scene_description: outdoors, grassy creek bank, flowing water, distant trees

segment_text: "I tell you. My Dad said to get rid of them. Let's sort of bury them somewhere or throw them in the creek."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy creek bank, flowing water, distant trees

segment_text: "He _told_ you to do that."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy creek bank, flowing water, distant trees

segment_text: "He made me say I had animals and then he said, 'Get rid of them.' I got to do what he says. Holy Smokes, he's my Dad."
scene_description: outdoors, grassy creek bank, flowing water, distant trees

segment_text: Some of the panic left Slim's heart. It was a thoroughly legalistic way out.
scene_description: outdoors, grassy creek bank, flowing water, distant trees

segment_text: "Well, let's do it right now, then, before they find out. Oh, golly, if they find out, will we be in trouble!"
scene_description: outdoors, grassy creek bank, flowing water, distant trees

segment_text: They broke into a run toward the barn, unspeakable visions in their minds.
scene_description: outdoors, grassy creek bank, flowing water, distant trees

segment_text: It was different, looking at them as though they were "people." As animals, they had been interesting; as "people," horrible.
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: Their eyes, which were neutral little objects before, now seemed to watch them with active malevolence.
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: "They're making noises," said Slim, in a whisper which was barely audible.
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: "I guess they're talking or something," said Red. Funny that those noises which they had heard before had not had significance earlier.
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: He was making no move toward them. Neither was Slim.
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: The canvas was off but they were just watching. The ground meat, Slim noticed, hadn't been touched.
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: Slim said, "Aren't you going to do something?"
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: "Aren't you?"
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: "You found them."
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: "It's your turn, now."
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: "No, it isn't. You found them. It's your fault, the whole thing.
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: I was watching."
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: "You joined in, Slim. You know you did."
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: "I don't care. You found them and that's what I'll say when they come here looking for us."
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: Red said, "All right for you." But the thought of the consequences inspired him anyway, and he reached for the cage door.
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: Slim said, "Wait!"
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: Red was glad to. He said, "Now what's biting you?"
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: "One of them's got something on him that looks like it might be iron or something."
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: "Where?"
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: "Right there. I saw it before but I thought it was just part of him. But if he's 'people,' maybe it's a disintegrator gun."
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: "What's that?"
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: "I read about it in the books from Beforethewars. Mostly people with space-ships have disintegrator guns.
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: They point them at you and you get disintegratored."
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: "They didn't point it at us till now," pointed out Red with his heart not quite in it.
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: "I don't care. I'm not hanging around here and getting disintegratored. I'm getting my father."
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: "Cowardy-cat. Yellow cowardy-cat."
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: "I don't care. You can call all the names you want, but if you bother them now you'll get disintegratored.
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: You wait and see, and it'll be all your fault." He made for the narrow spiral stairs that led to the main floor of the barn, stopped at its head, then backed away.
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: Red's mother was moving up, panting a little with the exertion and smiling a tight smile for the benefit of Slim in his capacity as guest.
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: "Red! You, Red! Are you up there? Now don't try to hide.
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: I know this is where you're keeping them. Cook saw where you ran with the meat."
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: Red quavered, "Hello, ma!"
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: "Now show me those nasty animals? I'm going to see to it that you get rid of them right away."
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: It was over! And despite the imminent corporal punishment, Red felt something like a load fall from him.
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: At least the decision was out of his hands.
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: "Right there, ma. I didn't do anything to them, ma. I didn't know.
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: They just looked like little animals and I thought you'd let me keep them, ma. I wouldn't have taken the meat only they wouldn't eat grass or leaves and we couldn't find good nuts or berries and cook never lets me have anything or I would have asked her and I didn't know it was for lunch and--"
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: He was speaking on the sheer momentum of terror and did not realize that his mother did not hear him but, with eyes frozen and popping at the cage, was screaming in thin, piercing tones.
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: The Astronomer was saying, "A quiet burial is all we can do. There is no point in any publicity now," when they heard the screams.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: She had not entirely recovered by the time she reached them, running and running. It was minutes before her husband could extract sense from her.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: She was saying, finally, "I tell you they're in the barn. I don't know what they are. No, no--"
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: She barred the Industrialist's quick movement in that direction. She said, "Don't _you_ go. Send one of the hands with a shotgun.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: I tell you I never saw anything like it. Little horrible beasts with--with--I can't describe it.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: To think that Red was touching them and trying to feed them. He was _holding_ them, and feeding them meat."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: Red began, "I only--" And Slim said, "It was not--"
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: The Industrialist said, quickly, "Now you boys have done enough harm today. March! Into the house!
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: And not a word; not one word! I'm not interested in anything you have to say. After this is all over, I'll hear you out and as for you, Red, I'll see that you're properly punished."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: He turned to his wife. "Now whatever the animals are, we'll have them killed." He added quietly once the youngsters were out of hearing, "Come, come.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: The children aren't hurt and, after all, they haven't done anything really terrible. They've just found a new pet."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: The Astronomer spoke with difficulty. "Pardon me, ma'am, but can you describe these animals?"
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: She shook her head. She was quite beyond words.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: "Can you just tell me if they--"
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: "I'm sorry," said the Industrialist, apologetically, "but I think I had better take care of her. Will you excuse me?"
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: "A moment. Please. One moment. She said she had never seen such animals before.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: Surely it is not usual to find animals that are completely unique on an estate such as this."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: "I'm sorry. Let's not discuss that now."
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: "Except that unique animals might have landed during the night." The Industrialist stepped away from his wife.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: "What are you implying?"
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: "I think we had better go to the barn, sir!"
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: The Industrialist stared a moment, turned and suddenly and quite uncharacteristically began running. The Astronomer followed and the woman's wail rose unheeded behind them.
scene_description: indoors, sunlit living room, comfortable furniture, window view

segment_text: The Industrialist stared, looked at the Astronomer, turned to stare again.
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: "Those?"
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: "Those," said the Astronomer. "I have no doubt we appear strange and repulsive to them."
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: "What do they say?"
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: "Why, that they are uncomfortable and tired and even a little sick, but that they are not seriously damaged, and that the youngsters treated them well."
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: "Treated them well! Scooping them up, keeping them in a cage, giving them grass and raw meat to eat? Tell me how to speak to them."
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: "It may take a little time. Think _at_ them. Try to listen.
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: It will come to you, but perhaps not right away." The Industrialist tried.
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: He grimaced with the effort of it, thinking over and over again, "The youngsters were ignorant of your identity." And the thought was suddenly in his mind: "We were quite aware of it and because we knew they meant well by us according to their own view of the matter, we did not attempt to attack them."
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: "Attack them?" thought the Industrialist, and said it aloud in his concentration.
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: "Why, yes," came the answering thought. "We are armed."
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: One of the revolting little creatures in the cage lifted a metal object and there was a sudden hole in the top of the cage and another in the roof of the barn, each hole rimmed with charred wood.
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: "We hope," the creatures thought, "it will not be too difficult to make repairs." The Industrialist found it impossible to organize himself to the point of directed thought.
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: He turned to the Astronomer. "And with that weapon in their possession they let themselves be handled and caged? I don't understand it."
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: But the calm thought came, "We would not harm the young of an intelligent species."
scene_description: indoors, dusty barn loft, wooden beams, metal cage, scattered hay

segment_text: It was twilight. The Industrialist had entirely missed the evening meal and remained unaware of the fact.
scene_description: outdoors, metallic spacecraft, twilight sky, silhouetted trees

segment_text: He said, "Do you really think the ship will fly?"
scene_description: outdoors, metallic spacecraft, twilight sky, silhouetted trees

segment_text: "If they say so," said the Astronomer, "I'm sure it will. They'll be back, I hope, before too long."
scene_description: outdoors, metallic spacecraft, twilight sky, silhouetted trees

segment_text: "And when they do," said the Industrialist, energetically, "I will keep my part of the agreement. What is more I will move sky and earth to have the world accept them.
scene_description: outdoors, metallic spacecraft, twilight sky, silhouetted trees

segment_text: I was entirely wrong, Doctor. Creatures that would refuse to harm children, under such provocation as they received, are admirable.
scene_description: outdoors, metallic spacecraft, twilight sky, silhouetted trees

segment_text: But you know--I almost hate to say this--"
scene_description: outdoors, metallic spacecraft, twilight sky, silhouetted trees

segment_text: "Say what?"
scene_description: outdoors, metallic spacecraft, twilight sky, silhouetted trees

segment_text: "The kids. Yours and mine. I'm almost proud of them.
scene_description: outdoors, metallic spacecraft, twilight sky, silhouetted trees

segment_text: Imagine seizing these creatures, feeding them or trying to, and keeping them hidden. The amazing gall of it.
scene_description: outdoors, metallic spacecraft, twilight sky, silhouetted trees

segment_text: Red told me it was his idea to get a job in a circus on the strength of them. Imagine!"
scene_description: outdoors, metallic spacecraft, twilight sky, silhouetted trees

segment_text: The Astronomer said, "Youth!"
scene_description: outdoors, metallic spacecraft, twilight sky, silhouetted trees

segment_text: The Merchant said, "Will we be taking off soon?"
scene_description: indoors, alien cockpit, glowing consoles, viewport showing dim landscape

segment_text: "Half an hour," said the Explorer.
scene_description: indoors, alien cockpit, glowing consoles, viewport showing dim landscape

segment_text: It was going to be a lonely trip back. All the remaining seventeen of the crew were dead and their ashes were to be left on a strange planet.
scene_description: indoors, alien cockpit, glowing consoles, viewport showing dim landscape

segment_text: Back they would go with a limping ship and the burden of the controls entirely on himself.
scene_description: indoors, alien cockpit, glowing consoles, viewport showing dim landscape

segment_text: The Merchant said, "It was a good business stroke, not harming the young ones. We will get very good terms; _very_ good terms."
scene_description: indoors, alien cockpit, glowing consoles, viewport showing dim landscape

segment_text: The Explorer thought: Business!
scene_description: indoors, alien cockpit, glowing consoles, viewport showing dim landscape

segment_text: The Merchant then said, "They've lined up to see us off. All of them. You don't think they're too close, do you?
scene_description: indoors, alien cockpit, glowing consoles, viewport showing dim landscape

segment_text: It would be bad to burn any of them with the rocket blast at this stage of the game."
scene_description: indoors, alien cockpit, glowing consoles, viewport showing dim landscape

segment_text: "They're safe."
scene_description: indoors, alien cockpit, glowing consoles, viewport showing dim landscape

segment_text: "Horrible-looking things, aren't they?"
scene_description: indoors, alien cockpit, glowing consoles, viewport showing dim landscape

segment_text: "Pleasant enough, inside. Their thoughts are perfectly friendly."
scene_description: indoors, alien cockpit, glowing consoles, viewport showing dim landscape

segment_text: "You wouldn't believe it of them. That immature one, the one that first picked us up--"
scene_description: indoors, alien cockpit, glowing consoles, viewport showing dim landscape

segment_text: "They call him Red," provided the Explorer.
scene_description: indoors, alien cockpit, glowing consoles, viewport showing dim landscape

segment_text: "That's a queer name for a monster. Makes me laugh. He actually feels _bad_ that we're leaving.
scene_description: indoors, alien cockpit, glowing consoles, viewport showing dim landscape

segment_text: Only I can't make out exactly why. The nearest I can come to it is something about a lost opportunity with some organization or other that I can't quite interpret."
scene_description: indoors, alien cockpit, glowing consoles, viewport showing dim landscape

segment_text: "A circus," said the Explorer, briefly.
scene_description: indoors, alien cockpit, glowing consoles, viewport showing dim landscape

segment_text: "What? Why, the impertinent monstrosity."
scene_description: indoors, alien cockpit, glowing consoles, viewport showing dim landscape

segment_text: "Why not? What would you have done if you had found _him_ wandering on _your_ native world; found him sleeping on a field on Earth, red tentacles, six legs, pseudopods and all?"
scene_description: indoors, alien cockpit, glowing consoles, viewport showing dim landscape

segment_text: Red watched the ship leave.
scene_description: outdoors, ascending spacecraft against twilight, distant ground, engine glow

segment_text: His red tentacles, which gave him his nickname, quivered their regret at lost opportunity to the very last, and the eyes at their tips filled with drifting yellowish crystals that were the equivalent of Earthly tears.
scene_description: outdoors, ascending spacecraft against twilight, distant ground, engine glow
